TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SharedPersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationStateInfo
Public NotInheritable Class SharedPersonalizationStateInfo Inherits PersonalizationStateInfo

summary.span: 表示頁面共用個人化資訊的輕量型版本。

span.span: Represents a lightweight version of shared personalization information about a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表網頁的個人化狀態的統計資訊。This class represents statistical information about the personalization state of a page. 它不會傳回 （例如套用或擷取個人化發生時的屬性資料） 的個人化資料本身。It does not return the personalization data (such as property data that is applied or extracted when personalization occurs) itself. 這個類別可用來判斷有多少使用者已儲存的個人化設定 頁面上，以及大小，以位元組為單位，該項資訊。This class can be used to determine how many users have saved personalization settings for a page, and the size, in bytes, of that information.

MemberSignature.Value: public SharedPersonalizationStateInfo (string path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, valuetype System.DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int32 size, int32 sizeOfPersonalizations, int32 countOfPersonalizations) cil managed

public: SharedPersonalizationStateInfo(System::String ^ path, DateTime lastUpdatedDate, int size, int sizeOfPersonalizations, int countOfPersonalizations);

param.name: path
param.span: 要套用資訊的目標網頁。

span.span: The page that the information applies to.

param.span: 是相對於應用程式 (使用波狀符號 (~) 符號語法) 的虛擬路徑。

span.span: is an application-relative (using tilde syntax) virtual path.

param.name: lastUpdatedDate
param.span: ，表示頁面共用資訊上次更新的時間。

span.span: A indicating when the shared information for the page was last updated.

param.name: size
param.span: 頁面共用狀態資訊的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the shared state information for the page.

param.name: sizeOfPersonalizations
param.span: 頁面所有個別使用者個人化資訊的總大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all per-user personalization information that exists for the page.

param.name: countOfPersonalizations
param.span: 已個人化頁面的使用者總數。

span.span: The total number of users who have personalized the page.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `countOfPersonalizations`參數代表已個人化頁面的使用者總數。The `countOfPersonalizations` parameter represents the total number of users who have personalized a page. 例如，如果 100 位使用者個人化 頁面上，則會將值的`countOfPersonalizations`該頁面會是 100，個人化的屬性數目乘上不是 100。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of `countOfPersonalizations` for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 請注意，此計數可能會或可能不會符合用於基礎資料存放區中保存每個使用者的詳細資訊，因為某些資料存放區提供者會使用多個資料列將單一使用者和頁面的每一使用者個人化資訊的資料列總數組合。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination. 請注意，`path`修剪如果不是 null。Note that `path` is trimmed if non-null.

span.span: , when trimmed, is an empty string ("").

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CountOfPersonalizations As Integer
public: property int CountOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得已個人化頁面的使用者總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of users that have personalized a page.

value.span: 已套用至頁面的個別使用者個人化設定總數。

span.span: The total number of per-user personalization settings that have been applied to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回已個人化頁面的使用者總數。This property returns the total number of users that have personalized a page. 例如，如果 100 位使用者個人化 頁面上，則會將值的該頁面會是 100，個人化的屬性數目乘上不是 100。For example, if 100 users personalize a page, then the value of for that page would be 100, not 100 multiplied by the number of personalized properties. 請注意，此計數可能會或可能不會符合用於基礎資料存放區中保存每個使用者的詳細資訊，因為某些資料存放區提供者會使用多個資料列將單一使用者和頁面的每一使用者個人化資訊的資料列總數組合。Note that this count might or might not match the total number of rows used in the underlying data store to persist per-user information, because some data storage providers use multiple rows to store per-user personalization information for a single user and page combination.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SizeOfPersonalizations As Integer
public: property int SizeOfPersonalizations { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得某一頁面所有個別使用者個人化資訊的總大小。

span.span: Gets the total size of all per-user personalization information for a page.

value.span: 某一頁面所有個人化資訊的總大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The total size, in bytes, of all personalization information for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回某一頁面所有個別使用者個人化資訊的大小。This property returns the size of all per-user personalization information that exists for a page. 這會是所傳回的值不同的值因為是以位元組為單位，只有頁面的每一使用者狀態大小，而且不包含中所包含的共用的狀態資料的大小值。This will be a different value than the value returned by because is the size in bytes of only the per-user state for a page and does not include the size of shared state data included in the value.
